title: Bug 118780: Set alias for columns in data set, but expression builder still shows old column names when selecting the dataset
OB: When setting an alias for columns in a data set, the expression builder still displays the old column names instead of the alias when selecting the dataset.
EB: The expression builder should display the aliases that were set for the columns of the selected dataset.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Create a new data source and dataset.
2. Set an alias for the first column in the dataset as "column1".
3. Insert a data item and bind it to the dataset.
4. Open the expression builder and select the dataset.
